text: is a Japanese, bilingual singer-songwriter based in Tokyo. ==Biography== Emyli debuted at the age of 15 from BMG Japan with her first single, "Rain." Since the release of her first album "Flower of Life," she has performed and toured with popular acts such as M-Flo and Shinhwa. Upon graduating Sophia University, she has been writing songs for J-Pop as well as K-Pop artists such as Namie Amuro, E-Girls, May J., SOL (BIG BANG), etc. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Flower of Life (2003) ===Singles=== * Rain (2003) * Someday (2003) * Voice of Love (2003) * The Other Side of Love (m-flo feat.
